content: *this will definitely make you take up crocheting * finished measurements bust 86-96-104-114-126-136 cm 33 7/8 -37¾ -41 -45 -49½ -53½ full length 58-60-62-64-66-68 cm 22¾ -23 5/8 -24 3/8 -25¼ -26 -26¾ materials drops silke-tweed from garnstudio 350-400-450-450-500-550 g color no 08 light beige and use drops alpaca from garnstudio 350-400-450-450-500-550 g color no 618 beige and use drops vivaldi from garnstudio 50 g for all sizes color no 13 beige drops crochet hook size 5 mm h/8 or size needed to get width of 12 single_crochet/treble_crochet and approx 4 pattern row 1 pattern row = 1 row single_crochet + 1 row treble_crochet = 10 x 10 cm 4 x 4 with 1 thread silke-tweed and 1 thread alpaca drops buffalo horn button no 537 3 pcs pattern links us version 1 uk version 2 french version 3 german version 4 finnish version 5 dutch version 6 1 http //www garnstudio com/lang/en/visoppskrift php d_nr=109&d_id=45&lang=us 2 http //www garnstudio com/lang/en/visoppskrift php d_nr=109&d_id=45&lang=en 3 http //www garnstudio com/lang/fr/visoppskrift php d_nr=109&d_id=45&lang=fr 4 http //www garnstudio com/lang/de/visoppskrift php d_nr=109&d_id=45&lang=de 5 http //www garnstudio com/lang/fi/visoppskrift php d_nr=109&d_id=45&lang=fi 6 http //www garnstudio com/lang/nl/visoppskrift php d_nr=109&d_id=45&lang=nl
